attributes.action: make it illegal (if it isn't already) for people with red/green colour blindness to drive any vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I imagine the reason is obvious: that they might drive through a red traffic light thinking it's green.  This could (obviously again) cause an accident; possibly very serious or even fatal.  People may feel it's unfair that anyone should be deprived of the freedom of the road due to a condition which is not within their control; I would agree but would also contend, VERY STRONGLY, that the right to use the road safely - and, ESPECIALLY, not to be an accident victim - should greatly supersede this.
